document.title: Hot Topic: Legislation Shortens Time to Correct Negative Changes in Net Assets for Water and Wastewater Facilities
document.abstract: MTAS recommends that municipal management and finance officials should carefully review the operations of their water and wastewater systems to ensure compliance with the new requirements of the act.
